    About

    1 minute read

    I like

    Currently, Seungjun Lee works as a Machine Learning Engineer at MakinaRocks, which he joined in 2022. His current research interests revolve around deep learning, generative models, and medical image analysis.

    🌐 Contact Info

    • Seoul National University - Bachelor Degree in Naval Architecture and Ocean Engineering (major) and Mechanical Engineering (minor)
